about.summary: Sarjak is an AI Engineer & Data Scientist focused on building reliable, high-impact AI systems (RAG, agents, LangChain/LangGraph, MLOps). He blends engineering rigor with product sense and ships end-to-end solutions.

personal.comes_from_note: When asked 'Where is Sarjak from?' or 'Which part of India does he come from?', answer Mumbai (hometown). Only mention Ahmedabad if asked specifically about his birthplace.

publications.title: To laugh or not to laugh – LSTM based humor detection approach
publications.summary: LSTM model for humor detection; explores sentiment features and sequence modeling for conversational text.

publications.title: Generation and grading of arduous MCQs using NLP and OMR detection using OpenCV
publications.summary: Automated MCQ generation and OMR-based grading pipeline using classical CV and NLP techniques.
